div.p: Gov Abbott extended closure through the end of the academic year
For more Information, Please Visit: Here

span.font: Welcome to Bland Independent School District, home of the Fighting Tigers. Bland ISD has received an A rating from the State of Texas. BISD proudly serves the communities of Floyd, Merit, and Wagner in North Texas. Bland currently educates approximately 725 students on three campuses located primarily in Hunt County and part of Collin County.

Our Pre-K through 12 educational programs reflect our commitment to life-long learning and our mission to provide students with the highest quality education. We are building tomorrow’s leaders today.

div.div: Commencement is currently scheduled for May 21, 2020 at 8:00 p.m. and will be streamed on Facebook live. . . .
